blocks.name: oprabexd
blocks.content: Existence of an operator abstraction. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprabexd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wmo(s2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe)), diffsw(s2, w0))
  eqeltrd(c0, universe, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)), universe), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))), wcel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))), universe))
  syl(w0, wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wmo(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)))
  sylibr(w0, wmo(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wmo(s2, w1)))
  ex(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wmo(s2, w1))
  moanimv(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)
  funoprabg(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))
  sylancr(w0, wcel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))), universe), wss(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))), cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe))
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, w1)
  xpexd(c1, c2, universe, universe, w0)
  ssexg(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1))), cxp(c1, c2), universe)
  funex(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w1)), universe)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oprabexd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2))→ ∃*(s2, w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈ 𝕌), d(s2, w0))
  eqeltrd(c0, universe, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)}, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)} ∈ 𝕌, Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)}), dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)})∈ 𝕌)
  syl(w0, Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)}), ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∃*(s2,((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, ∃*(s2,((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)))
  sylibr(w0, ∃*(s2,((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→ ∃*(s2, w1)))
  ex(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), ∃*(s2, w1))
  moanimv(s2, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), w1)
  funoprabg(s0, s1, s2, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1))
  sylancr(w0, dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)})∈ 𝕌, dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)})⊆(c1 × c2), (c1 × c2)∈ 𝕌)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, w1)
  xpexd(c1, c2, universe, universe, w0)
  ssexg(dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)}), (c1 × c2), universe)
  funex({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w1)}, universe)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: oprabex
blocks.content: Existence of an operation class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2004.)

thm oprabex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wmo(s2, w0))
  -| wceq(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqeltri(c0, universe, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)))
  mp2an(wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)), universe), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0))), wcel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0))), universe))
  funoprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0))
  mpbir(wmo(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wmo(s2, w0)))
  moanimv(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)
  ssexi(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0))), cxp(c1, c2))
  xpex(c1, c2)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, w0)
  funex(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)), universe)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oprabex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→ ∃*(s2, w0))
  ⊣ c0 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqeltri(c0, universe, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)})
  mp2an({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)} ∈ 𝕌, Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)}), dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)})∈ 𝕌)
  funoprab(s0, s1, s2, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0))
  mpbir(∃*(s2,((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→ ∃*(s2, w0)))
  moanimv(s2, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2), w0)
  ssexi(dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)}), (c1 × c2))
  xpex(c1, c2)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, w0)
  funex({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ w0)}, universe)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

  exbii(s0, wrex(s3, c0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wrex(s3, c0, w0)))))
  bitri(wrex(s3, c0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wrex(s3, c0, w0)))), wex(s1, wrex(s3, c0, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))

  bitri(wrex(s3, c0, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wrex(s3, c0, w0))), wex(s2, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))))

blocks.name: ab2rexex
blocks.content: Existence of a class abstraction of existentially restricted sets. Variables ` x ` and ` y ` are normally free-variable parameters in the class expression substituted for ` C ` , which can be thought of as ` C ( x , y ) ` . See comments for ~ abrexex . (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ab2rexex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), universe)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

blocks.name: ofmres
blocks.content: Equivalent expressions for a restriction of the function operation map. Unlike ` oF R ` which is a proper class, ` ( oF R |`` ( A X. B ) ) ` can be a set by ~ ofmresex , allowing it to be used as a function or structure argument. By ~ ofmresval , the restricted operation map values are the same as the original values, allowing theorems for ` oF R ` to be reused. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofmres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(c0), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(c0), cv(s1))), cres(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), cxp(c1, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  mp2an(wceq(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), cxp(c1, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))), wss(c1, universe), wss(c2, universe))
  ssv(c1)
  ssv(c2)
  resmpt2(s0, s1, c1, universe, c2, universe, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  reseq1i(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  mpoeq123i(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cv(s0), cof(c0), cv(s1)), c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(c1)
  eqid(c2)
  mp3an(wceq(co(cv(s0), cof(c0), cv(s1)), cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), universe))
  vex(s1)
  mptex(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  inex1(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1)))
  dmex(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), universe, cof(c0))
  df-of(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))))
}

thm ofmres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (oF(c0)|`(c1 × c2))=(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(s0[oF(c0)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((oF(c0)|`(c1 × c2)), (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(s0[oF(c0)]s1)), ((s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0))))|`(c1 × c2)), (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0)))))
  mp2an(((s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0))))|`(c1 × c2))=(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0)))), c1 ⊆ 𝕌, c2 ⊆ 𝕌)
  ssv(c1)
  ssv(c2)
  resmpt2(s0, s1, c1, universe, c2, universe, (hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0))))
  reseq1i(oF(c0), (c1 × c2), (s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0)))))
  mpoeq123i(s0, s1, c1, c2, (s0[oF(c0)]s1), c1, c2, (hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0))))
  eqid(c1)
  eqid(c2)
  mp3an((s0[oF(c0)]s1)=(hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0))), s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌, (hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0)))∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s1)
  mptex(hs0, (dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1)), ((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0)))
  inex1(dom(s0), dom(s1))
  dmex(s0)
  vex(s0)
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, universe, universe, (hs0 ∈(dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1))↦((s0 ` hs0)[c0](s1 ` hs0))), universe, oF(c0))
  df-of(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((dom(s0)⋂ dom(s1)))
}
